name: Paper Person
description:
Note: This is still WIP. Uploading it for feedback and testing.

A simple arcade-style game where you have to deliver newspapers, whilst avoiding traffic,  to score points.

Controls

    Keyboard

Move - A & D

Throw - Left and Right (arrows)

    Controller (recommended)

Move - Left Thumbstick (left and right)

Throw - Right Thumbstick (left and right)

Work Left

  • touch screen controls (they're currently unusable)
  • Highscore persistence

More Info

The game was made with the intention of publishing on mobile (Android).
However, I want to make sure the game is finished/polished before worrying about that.
